article.title: Bibliographic Retrieval from Bibliographic Input; The Hypothesis andConstruction of a Test
article.author: Ruecking, Frederick H. Jr.
article.text: A study of problems associated with bibliographic retrieval using unverified input data supplied by requesters.. A code derived from compression of title and author information to four, four-character abbreviations each was used for retrieval tests on an IBM 1401 computer.. Retrieval accuracy was 98.67%..
